data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Arias, Erick, Chaves, Gerardo, Crawford, Andrew J., Parra-Olea, Gabriela (2016): A new species of the Craugastor podiciferus species group (Anura: Craugastoridae) from the premontane forest of southwestern Costa Rica. Zootaxa 4132 (3): 347-363, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4132.3.3
